Title: Israeli society needs to be rebuilt from scratch – and care for ...
Description: Hadar Goldin was killed by Hamas in the 2014 Gaza war, and his body has been held captive ever since. His father sensed early on that 'something was broken' in Israeli society when it failed to bring his son home, and says that what happened on Oct. 7 was the ultimate 'disintegration of Israeli society'

Title: I think Israel and the army did everything at first, but now peo...

Title: Thai worker killed in northern Israel; IDF: Possibly hit by unexp...
Description: Nisan Miram, a 42-year-old migrant worker from Thailand, was employed in an apple orchard. Another worker who was with him experienced anxiety. Since the onset of the war, 42 foreign workers from Thailand have been killed, the majority during the Hamas attack on October 7

Title: A regional war is brewing in the Middle East, and the U.S. has no...

Title: Netanyahu prioritizes petty vengeance against defense chief Galla...
Description: While Israeli Defense Minister Gallant earned the trust of the U.S., Netanyahu's ties with Biden sharply deteriorated. One year after Oct. 7, the PM still sees Gallant as an enemy over his support for a hostage release deal, opposition to the judicial coup – and growing popularity

Title: Netanyahu still uncertain on Iran response, as Israeli army pushe...
Description: Israel's PM is having a good run: Hezbollah is crippled, the U.S. supports ground offensives in Lebanon, Iran's attack didn't do any major damage and gives him license to strike back. Unfortunately, his focus is currently on catchy names for Israel's multi-front war

Title: I constantly wonder if Sasha is managing to hold on to hope in G...
Description: Sasha Troufanov was kidnapped to Gaza from his home in Kibbutz Nir Oz. His childhood friend, who runs a command center advocating for his release, says 'it's Sasha's basic right to live the life he planned and return to his girlfriend and mother'

Title: Investigation: Netanyahu's government not only permits Jewish ter...
Description: Settlers call it a revolution: More than 60 illegal farm outposts have sprung up in the West Bank during the past seven years, seizing vast tracts of Palestinian land. With cheap labor provided by 'at-risk' youths, this enterprise has also become a main fomenter of Jewish terror in the territories – and the state is generously footing the bill

Description: The three reservists served in the IDF's 460th Brigade and were killed Thursday by an explosive device

Title: NSO's cash-for-cyber deal pushed by Israeli official sparks crimi...
Description: Israel's Defense Ministry actively supported NSO's sale of spyware in exchange for millions in cash, flown to Israel by private jet, but Colombian authorities deny purchasing it. Colombia has severed diplomatic relations with Israel, which may complicate their ability to obtain legal assistance from Israel

Title: Yes, they can control the weather': Hurricane Milton stirs antis...
Description: The range of responses connecting Hurricane Milton to the war in Gaza spanned from awareness-raising to downright conspiratorial. One post suggests CO2 from Israeli bombs sparked the hurricane, while another suggested the hurricane was America's punishment for supporting Israel

Title: Please come save us': Recordings of kibbutz hostage standoff rev...
Description: On October 7, Hamas terrorists held 15 Israeli civilians hostage at a home in Kibbutz Be'eri, demanding safe passage to Gaza. Recordings of phone calls obtained by Haaretz reveal critical communication failures between the various Israeli security forces involved in the rescue efforts, contributing to the deaths of all but two hostages

Recordings of phone calls obtained by Haaretz reveal critical communication failures between the various Israeli security forces involved in the rescue efforts, contributing to the deaths of all but two hostages

Title: After October 7, just how far right will Israel go?
Description: October 7 should have handed Israel's wild-eyed right the perfect storm for success: wartime rallying and vengeful fury. So why don't the polls over the past year back that up?

Title: An iconic Jerusalem village, magnet for pilgrims, faces a towerin...
Description: Ein Karem, a unique pastoral village in the Israeli capital, draws tourists from all over the world. Now, it's in danger of losing its charm due to a planned real estate project. 'There is incredible greed here,' says a resident who is fighting the construction plan

Title: Trump attends two October 7 memorial events in NY and Miami, meet...
Description: Trump offered to sign a Jewish prayer book given to him by a rabbi at one event. The former president also suggested that Gaza's beachfront property could offer economic benefits and praised Israel's 'amazing' warfare, and said Israel needs to 'get smart about Trump'

Title: Our friends died and our lives are on hold': Young Gazans on the...

Title: For a mother, when her child is a hostage, he's a hostage. It do...
Description: For me, he is alive,' says Yael Adar, mother of hostage Tamir Adar, who the IDF announced was killed in captivity. 'Cognitively, I know he's not, but emotionally I allow myself the illusion that maybe there was a mistake, that maybe he will be found injured, that he'll return'

Title: West Bank's Palestinians fear Israeli army and settlers will stop...
Description: The current olive harvest season is especially important for the Palestinians given the economic hardship caused by the war. Settlers have already used violence against harvesters, and many fear that the army won't provide adequate protection and will prevent them from accessing their lands

Title: Gaza's humanitarian crisis threatens to backfire on Israel
Description: Faced with international pressure, including possible military sanctions, Israel will be forced to acknowledge that it must provide a long-term solution to address the lack of aid to Gaza and the severe damage to civilian infrastructure caused during the war. It will also have to assume most of the economic burden

Title: Seven wounded as rockets fired from Lebanon target cities in nort...
Description: Barrages fired at Haifa, Carmiel and Tiberias caused injuries and damage

Title: Idan Shtivi, kidnapped from the Nova festival, was killed on Oct....
Description: The Israeli army informed Shtivi's family on Sunday that he was killed during the initial attack one year ago, and his body was taken to Gaza

Title: A year since Hamas' October 7 attack on Israel | Testimonies from...
Two Israeli soldiers killed near border with Lebanon
Description: Master Sgt. (res.) Etay Azulay from Oranit was killed on Sunday during combat operations against Hezbollah, while Warrant Officer (res.) Aviv Magen died on Monday from wounds sustained in the same incident

Title: Israeli soldier killed near Lebanon border
Description: Master Sgt. (res.) Etay Azulay from Oranit was killed on Sunday during combat operations against Hezbollah

Title: Missile from Yemen targeting Tel Aviv and central Israel intercep...
Description: IDF says it carried out 'targeted' Beirut strike ■ 140 rockets fired into northern Israel on Monday ■ Hamas fires two rockets into Tel Aviv, central Israel ■ IDF calls on northern Gaza residents to evacuate southward ■ Iran warns Israel against retaliation for missile attack ■ Palestinians report two killed by IDF fire in West Bank

Title: IDF says it carried out 'targeted' Beirut strike; Hamas fires roc...
Description: IDF: Some 35 rockets fired into northern Israel in last hours ■ Hamas fires two rockets into Tel Aviv, central Israel ■ IDF calls on northern Gaza residents to evacuate southward ■ Iran warns Israel against retaliation for missile attack ■ Palestinian Health Ministry: 12-year-old, 66-year-old Palestinians killed by IDF in West Bank ■ Commander of Iran's Quds force is 'in good health,' force's deputy chief says ■ IDF calls on residents of additional southern Lebanon villages to evacuate

Title: Hamas claims responsibility for rocket fire from Gaza to Tel Aviv...
Description: IDF: Some 20 rockets launched into northern Israel, no casualties reported ■ Hundreds gather outside PM Netanyahu's home in Jerusalem to mark Oct. 7 anniversary ■ Two drones intercepted over Rishon Letzion, central Israel ■ IDF strikes Beirut's Dahiyeh ■ IDF calls on residents of additional southern Lebanon villages to evacuate

Title: Israeli hostage kidnapped from Nova festival was killed on Octobe...
Description: Hundreds gather outside PM Netanyahu's home in Jerusalem to mark Oct. 7 anniversary ■ Two drones intercepted over Rishon Letzion, central Israel ■ IDF strikes Beirut's Dahiyeh ■ Over 135 rockets fired into northern Israel on Sunday ■ IDF calls on residents of additional southern Lebanon villages to evacuate north ■ Over 135 rockets fired into northern Israel on Sunday

Title: Israeli soldier killed on Israel-Lebanon border; 6 wounded by roc...
Description: Two drones intercepted over Rishon Letzion in central Israel ■ Israel strikes Beirut's Dahiyeh after IDF issues evacuation warnings ■ Over 135 rockets fired into northern Israel on Sunday ■ IDF calls on residents of additional southern Lebanon villages to evacuate north ■ Over 135 rockets fired into northern Israel on Sunday

Title: A year on in its war with Hamas and Hezbollah, Israel is stuck, w...
Description: Despite the IDF's successes in Gaza and southern Lebanon, the failure and abiding threat of October 7 will continue to hang over Israel. So will the war, which is liable to go on for years

Title: Almost half of Jewish Israelis, nearly all Arab citizens think th...
Description: A slim majority of Israelis believe the time has come to end the war in Gaza, according to a survey by the Israel Democracy Institute. Israeli Jews and Arabs agree that the war's main goal should be bringing back the hostages, not toppling Hamas. 45 percent of Israelis said that they are optimistic about Israel going forward

Title: Almost half the Jews, nearly all Arabs think the Gaza war must st...
Description: Most Israelis, Jewish and Arab alike, agree the war's main goal is to regain the hostages but the Jews are significantly more upbeat about the future

Title: We are dying of fear': A lost generation, Israeli and Palestinia...
Description: It's my little children who pay the price of these wars': The father of seven-year-old Amina al-Hassouni, the sole Israeli casualty of Iran's April missile strike and still hospitalized in Tel Aviv, expresses the pain and fatigue of parents across Israel and Gaza. But there's also a glimmer of hope

Title: 340,000 dunams have been set afire, causing worst damage in 60 ye...

Title: Israelis gather in Hostage Square on eve of Oct. 7 to share stori...
Description: Hundreds of people gathered in Hostage Square in Tel Aviv to begin commemorations marking one year since October 7. Families of hostages shared their stories of that day, and those of their loved ones
